Option Name: Solid Concrete, Whole Wall, R-10.2, Interior
Concrete Block Foam Core, Whole Wall, R-18.9
# Type: The material type of the foundation wall.
# Thickness: The thickness of the foundation wall.
# Insulation Nominal R-Value: Nominal R-value for the foundation wall insulation.
# Insulation Location: Whether the insulation is on the interior or exterior of the foundation wall.
# Insulation Distance To Top: The distance from the top of the foundation wall to the top of the foundation wall insulation.
# Insulation Distance To Bottom: The distance from the top of the foundation wall to the bottom of the foundation wall insulation.
# Assembly R-Value: Assembly R-value for the foundation walls. If provided, overrides the other foundation wall insulation inputs.
